summary: This document is an email correspondence discussing the receipt of securities related to Southern Trust Co., Inc. Lisa Hurd from Deutsche Bank Securities Inc. informs Janet Young about the securities received and requests clarification on another security that was expected but not received. The communication is marked as confidential.

persons.name: Lisa D Hurd
persons.context: Lisa Hurd is communicating about the receipt of securities and is seeking clarification on outstanding securities.

persons.name: Janet E Young
persons.context: Janet Young is the recipient of the email and is involved in the discussion regarding the securities.

persons.name: Harry Ball
persons.context: Harry Ball is copied in the email correspondence, indicating involvement in the securities matter.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is also copied in the email, suggesting she is part of the team handling the securities.

keyFacts: Lisa Hurd mentions receiving one security today, specifically an HSBC BRL STEP UP NOTE.
The communication is marked as confidential and pertains to securities for Southern Trust Co., Inc.
There is a request for clarification on another security that was expected but not received.
